dcterms:description: A resource of over 200,000 scholarly articles, including over 90,000 with full text, about COVID-19, SARS-CoV-2, and related coronaviruses. This freely available dataset is provided to the global research community to apply recent advances in NLP and other AI techniques to generate new insights in support of the ongoing fight against this infectious disease.
dcterms:title: CORD-19

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: Defines a new category of question-answering tasks. From the original textual sentence, a text fragment is picked out as the answer to a given question.
dcterms:title: Stanford Question Answering Dataset (SQuAD)

dcterms:creator: William B. Dolan
Chris Brockett
dcterms:description: The task consists of checking whether two sentences are semantically equivalent.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Research Paraphrase Corpus (MRPC)
